Articles.Content:
I was screwing around on my recently crashed pod, and I saw this. There is a mouth in the models for our kerbs!

This probably means the Kerbs are supposed to have expressions when in EVA. So far as I\'ve researched, no one has seen this before, so I\'m just putting out there that we might get to see their expressions of terror when EVAing soon
Aren\'t the same models used in the opening screen? They show (limited) emotion there.

I didn\'t know that. eh, I always start the game before they open their mouths anyway. XP
